sections.title: Diabolist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Diabolist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Diabolist)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting progression from a previous class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level without other class benefits.

sections.title: Damned (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: When killed, soul goes to Hell and resurrection requires a caster level check (DC 10 + diabolist level) or the spell fails.

sections.title: Imp Familiar (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Gains an imp familiar as per arcane bond with Improved Familiar, which gains additional spell-like abilities and telepathy range as levels increase.

sections.title: Infernal [Charisma](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/basics-ability-scores/ability-scores/#Charisma_Cha) (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Provides escalating bonuses to Charisma checks when interacting with devils, starting at +2 and reaching +6 at 7th level.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Must perform daily obedience ritual during spell preparation to maintain class abilities, choosing evangelist, exalted, or sentinel path for boons.

sections.title: Channel Hellfire (Su) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Can alter energy damage spells to deal hellfire damage as a free action, adding lawful and evil descriptors, uses per day equal to Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Infernal Bargain (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: When using planar ally on called devils, can make opposed Charisma check to halve the devil's service price.

sections.title: Augment Summoning (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Automatically gains the Augment Summoning feat even without meeting prerequisites.

sections.title: Diabolic Boon (Ex, Sp, or Su) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Gains three progressive boons from diabolic patron at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels based on chosen obedience path (evangelist, exalted, or sentinel).

sections.title: Heresy (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Provides bonuses to research devil sigils and true names, starting at +2 and increasing to +4 at 9th level.

sections.title: Hellish Soul (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Allows normal resurrection if killed by means other than the will of Asmodeus, archdevils, or other Hell authorities.

sections.title: Infernal Transport (Sp) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Can dimension door twice per day or expend both uses for teleport, traveling through Hell but cannot enter areas warded against evil.

sections.title: Hellfire Ray (Sp) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Can cast hellfire ray as a spell-like ability twice per day.

sections.title: Master Conjurer (Ex) (Diabolist)
sections.description: Can cast calling spells as standard action and bargain as move action when calling known devils, adding half social skill modifier to bargaining checks.
